cntinfo.hours: Monday through Friday, 8:30 am to 5 pm

City of Philadelphia, Office of Emergency Management

procstep.procdesc: Evacuation routes are maintained as a table of segment IDs with appropriate designations joined to the City's street centerline file.

cntperp.cntorg: City of Philadelphia, Office of Emergency Management

cntinfo.hours: Monday through Friday, 8:30 am to 5 pm

procstep.procdesc: Evacuation routes were adjusted due to the closure of the South Street Bridge for construction, expected to last through 2010. With the removal of the bridge, South St, designated for Pedestrians and Mass Transit Only, stopped east of the Schuylkill River at S 27th St.

cntperp.cntorg: City of Philadelphia, Office of Emergency Management

cntinfo.hours: Monday through Friday, 8:30 am to 5 pm

procstep.procdesc: Evacuation routes were reverted to their original designations with the reopening of the South Street Bridge. This included adding the South Street Bridge back as an evacuation route for Pedestrians and Mass Transit Only and removing the section of S 27th St between South St and Lombard St, which had served to connect the evacuation routes during the construction.

cntperp.cntorg: City of Philadelphia, Office of Emergency Management

cntinfo.hours: Monday through Friday, 8:30 am to 5 pm

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
